name: Espresso
description: Strong and aromatic single shot of pure coffee — for true coffee lovers.
review: Pure and strong flavor — perfect morning start.

name: Cappuccino
description: A perfect blend of espresso, milk, and foam — creamy and balanced.
review: Smooth texture and creamy top — absolutely delightful!

name: Caffe Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk — soft, smooth, and mild in flavor.
review: Perfect balance of coffee and milk. Soft and pleasant taste.

name: Mocha
description: A delicious combination of espresso, milk, and chocolate syrup.
review: Rich chocolate flavor with the right caffeine kick.

name: Americano
description: Espresso mixed with hot water — a simple, strong black coffee.
review: Simple yet refreshing — best choice for black coffee lovers.

name: Cold Brew
description: Smooth and low-acid coffee brewed slowly in cold water for hours.
review: Cool, smooth, and perfectly balanced for hot days.

name: Iced Latte
description: Chilled milk and espresso served over ice — light and refreshing.
review: Light and refreshing, perfect for summer.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso layered with milk and sweet caramel — aromatic and rich.
review: Sweet, aromatic, and smooth — a fan favorite!

name: Hazelnut Latte
description: Espresso and milk with a nutty hazelnut flavor — creamy and comforting.
review: Delicious nutty flavor with a creamy finish.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: Traditional thick and rich coffee brewed in Turkish style — bold and aromatic.
review: Authentic taste — thick, strong, and aromatic.
